units.specialRules: Individual, Famulus: Whenever this unit rolls to hit with Lightning Bolt, Bane Chant, Drain Life or Bloodboil, it can reroll all dice that, score a natural, unmodified 1. Transfusion: At the start of each of your ranged phases you can transfer up to D2 points of damage from a Friendly Core Bloodbound unit within 6” of this unit to a Friendly Core Draugr unit also within 6” of this unit. A unit can only be targeted with a single Transfusion per turn. The Draugr unit will not take a nerve test for damage taken in this way. Spells: Lightning Bolt (4)
